se.kth.akok.index.algorithms.orderpoints

Class SortingPointsAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.kth.akok.index.algorithms.orderpoints.SortingPointsAlgorithm

  • public class SortingPointsAlgorithm
extends Object
    SortingPointsAlgorithm sorts points in a clockwise order, using the angles of each ray from the X axis. It sorts VisiblePoints and shadowPoints for a specific polygonPoint.

    Added also visible boundary points, for polygons that are nearby the bounding boux.

    Author:
    Andreas Kokkalis

      • sort

        private void sort(Ray ray1,
        Ray ray2,
        PolygonPoint startPoint)
        Prepares the angles from x axis for each ray. Converts the angles from 0 to 2Î . Then it calls quicksort in descending order.
        Parameters:
        ray1 - The first adjacent polygon edge
        ray2 - The second adjacent polygon edge
